entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kelowna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:03 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kelowna Airport 7:57 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: NNW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
